name: Quest of Shooting Suns
description:
Shoot your arrows as the Chinese legendary archer Yi in this parodic farce, and unlock all 3 unique absurd endings! 

Once upon a time, there were 10 suns in the sky, bringing drought and famine to the land.

You are the sun shooting hero Yi. Please aim your arrow to the suns - wait, wait, not to the people! 

If you got your arrows missed, there will be the noir! ( what a strain connection to the theme of this jam LOL)

I was surprised how quick I made this game with the help of AI. It only took me about 6 or 8 hours. 

Thank you, Stable Diffusion, and the three_flavor_wonton_mix model.
